mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_BOARD VALUES( (SELECT 'B' || LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(BOARD_CD),2)+1,1),8,'0') FROM ST_BOARD), #{member_cd}, #{cate_cd}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_file}, #{board_image}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ST_BOARD SB JOIN ST_MEMBER SM ON SB.MEMBER_CD = SM.MEMBER_CD JOIN ST_CATEGORY SC ON SB.CATE_CD = SC.CATE_CD WHERE SB.MEMBER_CD = #{member_cd} AND SB.CATE_CD = #{cate_cd}
SELECT * FROM ST_BOARD SB JOIN ST_MEMBER SM ON SB.MEMBER_CD = SM.MEMBER_CD JOIN ST_CATEGORY SC ON SB.CATE_CD = SC.CATE_CD WHERE SB.BOARD_CD = #{board_cd}
